summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A PROBLEM WITH THE RACK AND PINION, THERE WAS A RECALL REGARDING THE ISSUE, HOWEVER THE VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  *JB  WHEN THE CONSUMER MADE A LEFT TURN IN THE PARKING LOT, HE HEARD A SNAPPING NOISE IN THE FRONT END AND THE STEERING HAD BECOME HARD.  THE STEERING REMAINED HARD TO THE LEFT, BUT EASY TO THE RIGHT.  SCC  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT.  *JB
